# thunder_debug_fw (Resource)

`thunder_debug_fw`: Debug Firewall

__PLACEHOLDER__

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "thunder" {
  address  = var.dut9049
  username = var.username
  password = var.password
}
resource "thunder_debug_fw" "thunder_debug_fw" {
  ddos = 0
}
```
